creator: Godzilab Inc
descriptionHtml:
March your way through the evil lands, crush the gigantic bosses and free the princess in the epic IDLE role-playing game, Crush Them All.
Tap with one finger, collect and upgrade hundreds of heroes, find powerful artifacts and progress in this never-ending journey even while taking a break!

GAME FEATURES:

★ IDLE GAME :
Setup your heroes and let them fight while you’re away. When you return to your phone, they will be stronger and will have collected tons of loot.

★ COLLECT and UPGRADE heroes to crush stronger enemies along your journey

★ EXPLORE 1000+ stages

★ GUILD RAID BATTLES :
Join multiplayer guild boss-battles and lead your guild to supremacy!

★ CRAFT 50+ powerful artifacts to give your heroes more powers


PLEASE NOTE! Crush Them All is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Crush Them All.

A network connection is also required.
descriptionShort: The unique IDLE RPG on Google Play. Upgrade your heroes and battle for victory!

appDetails.developerAddress: 208 Rocky Point Rd, Palos Verdes, 90274 CA
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- A brand new game mode called Tournaments where you can compete against 50 players in real time
- New player profile and Success for top players to brag about
- 2 New common heroes
- 1.61.123: Fixed Achievements

appDetails.developerAddress: 208 Rocky Point Rd, Palos Verdes, 90274 CA
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The summer update is here, with tons of QoL improvements:
- Friendly Battles: You can now battle your guild mates and show them who is the best.
- We rebalanced a lot of heroes, no nerf, only buff. Check the release note for more details.
- More skins of your preferred heroes are coming.
- New Guild Chat while staging
- The best guild boss buffs are now visible when selecting your team.
- Revamped of the Ascend UI

And more... Check the release note for more details

appDetails.developerAddress: 208 Rocky Point Rd, Palos Verdes, 90274 CA
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Halloween is around the corner! Come Trick or Treat in Crush Them All!
+ New Slay Boss Event and improvements:
1. Twin Face is joining the new slay boss event with 3 artifacts giving awakening shards and rune dust on a daily basis.
2. A new bi-element hero is joining the light faction: Seraph.
3. Get Awakening shards based on the highest boss lv reached

+ Halloween:
1. New hero, Lycan will appear in this new event.

title: Crush Them All

container.value: 208 Rocky Point Rd, Palos Verdes, 90274 CA

creator: Imperia Online JSC
descriptionHtml:
Crush Them All is a TAP TAP RPG Pixel game mixed with Idle heroes gameplay. Recruit heroes and build an invincible army to crush the forces of Evil. Explore a fantasy world full of Demons, Beasts, and Gigantic bosses and Crush your way through magical places in this Clicker Heroes adventure.

TAP TAP your way through the evil lands, crush the gigantic bosses and free the princess in the epic IDLE role-playing Pixel game, Crush Them All.

TAP TAP with one finger, collect and upgrade hundreds of heroes, find powerful artifacts, and progress in this never-ending journey even while taking a break!

⚔️ CRUSH THEM ALL - IDLE GAME

Set up your heroes and let them fight while you're away. Then, when you return to your phone, they will be stronger and will have collected tons of loot.

⚡ CRUSH THEM ALL WITH YOUR SKILLS

Clicker heroes are not enough. Powerful skills are available to improve your chances to crush the forces of Evil.

💰 TAP TAP to COLLECT

TAP TAP to collect items and coins to support the growth of your idle heroes.

👹 CRUSH & EXPLORE 1000+ STAGES

TAP TAP your enemies to hell. Crush gigantic bosses and save the realm from the forces of Evil.

🔥 GUILD RAID BATTLES

Join multiplayer guild boss-battles and lead your guild to supremacy! Join forces with Idle heroes for training and build a powerful guild.

⚒️ CRAFT 50+ ARTIFACTS

What is a hero without its weapon? TAP TAP to craft and build the best artifacts and weapons to crush any challenges ahead.


🦸‍♂️ + 100 HEROES TO RECRUIT

Mages, Arches, Golems, and more! Improve your Idle heroes collection to crush at any situation.


🎲 Why this Idle pixel game is awesome
Pixel game with unique graphics.
Idle heroes for collecting.
Rpg Pixel game focus, make your own choices.
Clicker Heroes is fun and easy to play.
Idle fun playing with only one hand.
Clicker heroes just with one finger.
Pixel game graphics with classic nostalgia.
RPG without a big commitment.
TAP TAP is easy to play but hard to conquer.
Pixel game action with powerful heroes.

PLEASE NOTE! Crush Them All is free to download and play. However, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Crush Them All.

A network connection is also required.
descriptionShort: TAP TAP to upgrade and recruit heroes out of the evil lands in this Idle RPG.

Imperia Online JSC
69 Bulgaria Blvd, Manastirski Livadi
Infinity Tower, Floor 16
1404 Sofia
Bulgaria

descriptionHtml:
Crush Them All is a TAP TAP RPG Pixel game mixed with Idle heroes gameplay. Recruit heroes and build an invincible army to crush the forces of Evil. Explore a fantasy world full of Demons, Beasts, and Gigantic bosses and Crush your way through magical places in this Clicker Heroes adventure.

TAP TAP your way through the evil lands, crush the gigantic bosses and free the princess in the epic IDLE role-playing Pixel game, Crush Them All.

TAP TAP with one finger, collect and upgrade hundreds of heroes, find powerful artifacts, and progress in this never-ending journey even while taking a break!

⚔️ CRUSH THEM ALL - IDLE GAME

Set up your heroes and let them fight while you're away. Then, when you return to your phone, they will be stronger and will have collected tons of loot.

⚡ CRUSH THEM ALL WITH YOUR SKILLS

Clicker heroes are not enough. Powerful skills are available to improve your chances to crush the forces of Evil.

💰 TAP TAP to COLLECT

TAP TAP to collect items and coins to support the growth of your idle heroes.

👹 CRUSH & EXPLORE 1000+ STAGES

TAP TAP your enemies to hell. Crush gigantic bosses and save the realm from the forces of Evil.

🔥 GUILD RAID BATTLES

Join multiplayer guild boss-battles and lead your guild to supremacy! Join forces with Idle heroes for training and build a powerful guild.

⚒️ CRAFT 50+ ARTIFACTS

What is a hero without its weapon? TAP TAP to craft and build the best artifacts and weapons to crush any challenges ahead.


🦸‍♂️ + 100 HEROES TO RECRUIT

Mages, Arches, Golems, and more! Improve your Idle heroes collection to crush at any situation.


🎲 Why this Idle pixel game is awesome
Pixel game with unique graphics.
Idle heroes for collecting.
Rpg Pixel game focus, make your own choices.
Clicker Heroes is fun and easy to play.
Idle fun playing with only one hand.
Clicker heroes just with one finger.
Pixel game graphics with classic nostalgia.
RPG without a big commitment.
TAP TAP is easy to play but hard to conquer.
Pixel game action with powerful heroes.

PLEASE NOTE! Crush Them All is free to download and play. However, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Crush Them All.

A network connection is also required.
descriptionShort: TAP to upgrade and recruit heroes out of the evil lands in this Idle RPG.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Gameplay:
• Individual battle speed for pvp game modes.
• Rune tournament.
• Tournament leagues now have 20 leagues.
• 3x prisms option at ascend.
• Daily dungeon "Victory" pop-up gets a new "Replay" button.

Heroes:
1. Arcana:
• New passive ability - Team: Buff Atk per sec (Light heroes only).
• Base Atk increased to 32.

2. One Eye:
• New passive ability - Team: Buff Critical Damage (All heroes).
• Base Atk increased to 35.

Misc:
• Removal of "One time offer" for standard flooz packs.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Latest game feature:

Break all runes tier 1-3:
• When tapping on the "Break Runes" button in the rune bag a new button "Break 1-3 :ss:" is available. When used it will break all tier 1-3 runes which are not locked or equipped.

Bug fixes:

Crusade boss stage game speed:
• A fix for the 1x game speed during Crusade boss stages. The speed now should be properly set based on the value for regular Crusade stages.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Power number crunch
• All power related values will be reduced by a factor of 10.
• This does not affect the strength of your heroes or artifacts.

2. Removal of Raid (silver) tickets for Daily Dungeons.
• You will no longer need the silver tickets to raid Daily Dungeons.
• All silver tickets you owned will be converted at a 1:20 ratio to Prismatic Shards after you login on the new version.

3. Misc
• Sakura Kunoichi - a new skin for Kasumi.

title: Crush Them All - PVP Idle RPG

container.value:
Imperia Online JSC
69 Bulgaria Blvd, Manastirski Livadi
Infinity Tower, Floor 16
1404 Sofia
Bulgaria

creator: Imperia Online JSC
descriptionHtml:
Crush Them All is a TAP TAP RPG Pixel game mixed with Idle heroes gameplay. Recruit heroes and build an invincible army to crush the forces of Evil. Explore a fantasy world full of Demons, Beasts, and Gigantic bosses and Crush your way through magical places in this Clicker Heroes adventure.

TAP TAP your way through the evil lands, crush the gigantic bosses and free the princess in the epic IDLE role-playing Pixel game, Crush Them All.

TAP TAP with one finger, collect and upgrade hundreds of heroes, find powerful artifacts, and progress in this never-ending journey even while taking a break!

⚔️ CRUSH THEM ALL - IDLE GAME

Set up your heroes and let them fight while you're away. Then, when you return to your phone, they will be stronger and will have collected tons of loot.

⚡ CRUSH THEM ALL WITH YOUR SKILLS

Clicker heroes are not enough. Powerful skills are available to improve your chances to crush the forces of Evil.

💰 TAP TAP to COLLECT

TAP TAP to collect items and coins to support the growth of your idle heroes.

👹 CRUSH & EXPLORE 1000+ STAGES

TAP TAP your enemies to hell. Crush gigantic bosses and save the realm from the forces of Evil.

🔥 GUILD RAID BATTLES

Join multiplayer guild boss-battles and lead your guild to supremacy! Join forces with Idle heroes for training and build a powerful guild.

⚒️ CRAFT 50+ ARTIFACTS

What is a hero without its weapon? TAP TAP to craft and build the best artifacts and weapons to crush any challenges ahead.


🦸‍♂️ + 100 HEROES TO RECRUIT

Mages, Arches, Golems, and more! Improve your Idle heroes collection to crush at any situation.


🎲 Why this Idle pixel game is awesome
Pixel game with unique graphics.
Idle heroes for collecting.
Rpg Pixel game focus, make your own choices.
Clicker Heroes is fun and easy to play.
Idle fun playing with only one hand.
Clicker heroes just with one finger.
Pixel game graphics with classic nostalgia.
RPG without a big commitment.
TAP TAP is easy to play but hard to conquer.
Pixel game action with powerful heroes.

PLEASE NOTE! Crush Them All is free to download and play. However, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Crush Them All.

A network connection is also required.
descriptionShort: Progress even when AFK! Collect heroes & fight in this Idle RPG game with PVP!

title: Crush Them All - PVP Idle RPG

container.value:
Imperia Online JSC
69 Bulgaria Blvd, Manastirski Livadi
Infinity Tower, Floor 16
1404 Sofia
Bulgaria

creator: Imperia Online JSC
descriptionHtml:
Crush Them All is a TAP TAP RPG Pixel game mixed with Idle heroes gameplay. Recruit heroes and build an invincible army to crush the forces of Evil. Explore a fantasy world full of Demons, Beasts, and Gigantic bosses and Crush your way through magical places in this Clicker Heroes adventure.

TAP TAP your way through the evil lands, crush the gigantic bosses and free the princess in the epic IDLE role-playing Pixel game, Crush Them All.

TAP TAP with one finger, collect and upgrade hundreds of heroes, find powerful artifacts, and progress in this never-ending journey even while taking a break!

⚔️ CRUSH THEM ALL - IDLE GAME

Set up your heroes and let them fight while you're away. Then, when you return to your phone, they will be stronger and will have collected tons of loot.

⚡ CRUSH THEM ALL WITH YOUR SKILLS

Clicker heroes are not enough. Powerful skills are available to improve your chances to crush the forces of Evil.

💰 TAP TAP to COLLECT

TAP TAP to collect items and coins to support the growth of your idle heroes.

👹 CRUSH & EXPLORE 1000+ STAGES

TAP TAP your enemies to hell. Crush gigantic bosses and save the realm from the forces of Evil.

🔥 GUILD RAID BATTLES

Join multiplayer guild boss-battles and lead your guild to supremacy! Join forces with Idle heroes for training and build a powerful guild.

⚒️ CRAFT 50+ ARTIFACTS

What is a hero without its weapon? TAP TAP to craft and build the best artifacts and weapons to crush any challenges ahead.


🦸‍♂️ + 100 HEROES TO RECRUIT

Mages, Arches, Golems, and more! Improve your Idle heroes collection to crush at any situation.


🎲 Why this Idle pixel game is awesome
Pixel game with unique graphics.
Idle heroes for collecting.
Rpg Pixel game focus, make your own choices.
Clicker Heroes is fun and easy to play.
Idle fun playing with only one hand.
Clicker heroes just with one finger.
Pixel game graphics with classic nostalgia.
RPG without a big commitment.
TAP TAP is easy to play but hard to conquer.
Pixel game action with powerful heroes.

PLEASE NOTE! Crush Them All is free to download and play. However, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Crush Them All.

A network connection is also required.

- Profile button in the main UI for ease of access

TAP TAP with one finger, collect and upgrade hundreds of heroes, find powerful artifacts, and progress in this never-ending journey even while taking a break!

⚔️ CRUSH THEM ALL - IDLE GAME

Set up your heroes and let them fight while you're away. Then, when you return to your phone, they will be stronger and will have collected tons of loot.

⚡ CRUSH THEM ALL WITH YOUR SKILLS

Clicker heroes are not enough. Powerful skills are available to improve your chances to crush the forces of Evil.

💰 TAP TAP to COLLECT

TAP TAP to collect items and coins to support the growth of your idle heroes.

👹 CRUSH & EXPLORE 1000+ STAGES

TAP TAP your enemies to hell. Crush gigantic bosses and save the realm from the forces of Evil.

🔥 GUILD RAID BATTLES

Join multiplayer guild boss-battles and lead your guild to supremacy! Join forces with Idle heroes for training and build a powerful guild.

⚒️ CRAFT 50+ ARTIFACTS

What is a hero without its weapon? TAP TAP to craft and build the best artifacts and weapons to crush any challenges ahead.


🦸‍♂️ + 100 HEROES TO RECRUIT

Mages, Arches, Golems, and more! Improve your Idle heroes collection to crush at any situation.


🎲 Why this Idle pixel game is awesome
Pixel game with unique graphics.
Idle heroes for collecting.
Rpg Pixel game focus, make your own choices.
Clicker Heroes is fun and easy to play.
Idle fun playing with only one hand.
Clicker heroes just with one finger.
Pixel game graphics with classic nostalgia.
RPG without a big commitment.
TAP TAP is easy to play but hard to conquer.
Pixel game action with powerful heroes.

PLEASE NOTE! Crush Them All is free to download and play. However, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Crush Them All.

A network connection is also required.

title:
Crush Them All - PVP Idle RPG
2.0.540

container.value:
Imperia Online JSC
69 Bulgaria Blvd, Manastirski Livadi
Infinity Tower, Floor 16
1404 Sofia
Bulgaria

creator: Imperia Online JSC
descriptionHtml:
Crush Them All is a TAP TAP RPG Pixel game mixed with Idle heroes gameplay. Recruit heroes and build an invincible army to crush the forces of Evil. Explore a fantasy world full of Demons, Beasts, and Gigantic bosses and Crush your way through magical places in this Clicker Heroes adventure.

TAP TAP your way through the evil lands, crush the gigantic bosses and free the princess in the epic IDLE role-playing Pixel game, Crush Them All.

TAP TAP with one finger, collect and upgrade hundreds of heroes, find powerful artifacts, and progress in this never-ending journey even while taking a break!

⚔️ CRUSH THEM ALL - IDLE GAME

Set up your heroes and let them fight while you're away. Then, when you return to your phone, they will be stronger and will have collected tons of loot.

⚡ CRUSH THEM ALL WITH YOUR SKILLS

Clicker heroes are not enough. Powerful skills are available to improve your chances to crush the forces of Evil.

💰 TAP TAP to COLLECT

TAP TAP to collect items and coins to support the growth of your idle heroes.

👹 CRUSH & EXPLORE 1000+ STAGES

TAP TAP your enemies to hell. Crush gigantic bosses and save the realm from the forces of Evil.

🔥 GUILD RAID BATTLES

Join multiplayer guild boss-battles and lead your guild to supremacy! Join forces with Idle heroes for training and build a powerful guild.

⚒️ CRAFT 50+ ARTIFACTS

What is a hero without its weapon? TAP TAP to craft and build the best artifacts and weapons to crush any challenges ahead.


🦸‍♂️ + 100 HEROES TO RECRUIT

Mages, Arches, Golems, and more! Improve your Idle heroes collection to crush at any situation.


🎲 Why this Idle pixel game is awesome
Pixel game with unique graphics.
Idle heroes for collecting.
Rpg Pixel game focus, make your own choices.
Clicker Heroes is fun and easy to play.
Idle fun playing with only one hand.
Clicker heroes just with one finger.
Pixel game graphics with classic nostalgia.
RPG without a big commitment.
TAP TAP is easy to play but hard to conquer.
Pixel game action with powerful heroes.

PLEASE NOTE! Crush Them All is free to download and play. However, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Crush Them All.

A network connection is also required.
descriptionShort: Progress even when AFK! Collect heroes & fight in this Idle RPG game with PVP!

descriptionHtml:
Crush Them All is a TAP TAP RPG Pixel game mixed with Idle heroes gameplay. Recruit heroes and build an invincible army to crush the forces of Evil. Explore a fantasy world full of Demons, Beasts, and Gigantic bosses and Crush your way through magical places in this Clicker Heroes adventure.

TAP TAP your way through the evil lands, crush the gigantic bosses and free the princess in the epic IDLE role-playing Pixel game, Crush Them All.

TAP TAP with one finger, collect and upgrade hundreds of heroes, find powerful artifacts, and progress in this never-ending journey even while taking a break!

⚔️ CRUSH THEM ALL - IDLE GAME

Set up your heroes and let them fight while you're away. Then, when you return to your phone, they will be stronger and will have collected tons of loot.

⚡ CRUSH THEM ALL WITH YOUR SKILLS

Clicker heroes are not enough. Powerful skills are available to improve your chances to crush the forces of Evil.

💰 TAP TAP to COLLECT

TAP TAP to collect items and coins to support the growth of your idle heroes.

👹 CRUSH & EXPLORE 1000+ STAGES

TAP TAP your enemies to hell. Crush gigantic bosses and save the realm from the forces of Evil.

🔥 GUILD RAID BATTLES

Join multiplayer guild boss-battles and lead your guild to supremacy! Join forces with Idle heroes for training and build a powerful guild.

⚒️ CRAFT 50+ ARTIFACTS

What is a hero without its weapon? TAP TAP to craft and build the best artifacts and weapons to crush any challenges ahead.


🦸‍♂️ + 100 HEROES TO RECRUIT

Mages, Arches, Golems, and more! Improve your Idle heroes collection to crush at any situation.


🎲 Why this Idle pixel game is awesome
Pixel game with unique graphics.
Idle heroes for collecting.
Rpg Pixel game focus, make your own choices.
Clicker Heroes is fun and easy to play.
Idle fun playing with only one hand.
Clicker heroes just with one finger.
Pixel game graphics with classic nostalgia.
RPG without a big commitment.
TAP TAP is easy to play but hard to conquer.
Pixel game action with powerful heroes.

PLEASE NOTE! Crush Them All is free to download and play. However, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Crush Them All.

A network connection is also required.
